title: ArtyTorrent Pack 33-Oneshots-Bass Guitar-WAV multi-samples 1
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 33-Oneshots-Bass Guitar-WAV multi-samples 1
------------------------------------------------------------

A few people have asked for bass guitar samples, so here is some low-end food for your sampler.
The individual samples (all normalized 44KHz WAVs) each have their pitch in the filename, so you shouldn&#039;t have any trouble mapping them in your sampler of choice. 
I&#039;ve tried to provide a variety of bass guitars and playing styles as a taster for future torrents. Also included are DirectWave instrument presets for those of you using FL Studio.

If this pack is a success, I&#039;ll upload samples of several other bass guitars with a multitude of playing styles (slap bass etc.)

Included in this pack are:
--------------------------
Kontakt 2 Real Bass - 12 samples.
Rickenbacker Fingered Bass 1 - 22 samples.
Rickenbacker Picked Bass 1 - 22 samples.
Stingray Plucked Bass - 19 samples.
WM Fretless Short Bass - 26 samples.

PLUS: 1x NKI, 5x DWP presets.

Also included my freshly written tutorial - "Getting the most from BASS GUITAR samples".
-------

The samples are from various sources including BASS X, Kontakt 2, and Workingman&#039;s Bass by Rudy Sarzo.

Hopefully, you&#039;ll find them useful...
--
Arty - "All your bass are belong to us" - 2 February 2008
